attributes.action: Increase the age to 21 for drinking or purchasing alcohol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think we should increase the age to 21 before you are able to consume or purchase alcohol.This would be in line with the USA, and it works.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at : http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/agealcoholto21/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
